content: it is a simple **1×1 rib-stitch** scarf made with lace-weight cashmere yarn though it also works well with other yarn weights it creates a neat edge by adding two selvedge stitches at the beginning and end of each row along with two slip-stitch rib row at the start and end of the scarf to prevent the ends from curling you may knit a bit tighter or use a smaller needle size for the first and last two row
